title: Loyalty Challenge State
description: Captures the state and progress of loyalty challenges for a customer, including tasks, dependencies, and completion tracking.

id.title: Challenge ID
id.description: Unique identifier for the loyalty challenge.

name.title: Challenge Name
name.description: Human-readable name of the loyalty challenge.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date and time when the challenge started or became available.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: Date and time when the challenge expires or ended.

completionDate.title: Completion Date
completionDate.description: Date and time when the challenge was completed.

signupDate.title: Signup Date
signupDate.description: Date and time when the customer signed up for the challenge.

optedIn.title: Opted In
optedIn.description: Indicates whether the customer has opted into the challenge.

tasksToComplete.title: Tasks to Complete
tasksToComplete.description: Number of tasks required to complete the challenge.

challengeId.title: Challenge ID
challengeId.description: ID of the challenge that this challenge depends on.

state.title: State
state.description: Required state of the dependent challenge.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: List of tasks within the challenge.
